mapper.select: SELECT DCLZ_WORK_DE, DCLZ_EMPL_ID, DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, DCLZ_LVFFC_TM, DCLZ_DAIL_WORK_TIME, DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME, COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS FROM DCLZ WHERE TO_CHAR(DCLZ_WORK_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId}

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME), 0) AS MAX_WEEKLY_WORK_TIME FROM ( SELECT DCLZ_EMPL_ID, DCLZ_WORK_DE, DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME FROM DCLZ WHERE DCLZ_WORK_DE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 4 AND DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId} )
SELECT to_char(DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, 'DY HH24:MI') FROM DCLZ WHERE DCLZ_WORK_DE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 4 AND DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId}
SELECT to_char(DCLZ_LVFFC_TM, 'DY HH24:MI') FROM DCLZ WHERE DCLZ_WORK_DE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 4 AND DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId}
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(DCLZ_WORK_DE, 'YYYY') AS WORK_YEAR FROM DCLZ where DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId} ORDER BY WORK_YEAR
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(DCLZ_WORK_DE, 'MM') AS WORK_MONTH FROM DCLZ where TO_CHAR(DCLZ_WORK_DE, 'YYYY') = #{year} and DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId} ORDER BY WORK_MONTH

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DCLZ_WORK_DE, #{dclzEmplId} as DCLZ_EMPL_ID, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, '2000-01-01 00:00:00' as DCLZ_LVFFC_TM, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN') = 'MON' THEN (SELECT DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME FROM DCLZ WHERE DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId} AND DCLZ_WORK_DE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ELSE NVL((SELECT DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME FROM DCLZ WHERE DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEmplId} AND DCLZ_WORK_DE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),0) END as DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME, 'LABOR_STTUS015' as COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DCLZ ( DCLZ_WORK_DE, DCLZ_EMPL_ID, DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, DCLZ_LVFFC_TM, DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME, COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS ) values ( to_date(#{dclzWorkDe}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{dclzEmplId}, to_date(#{dclzAttendTm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{dclzLvffcTm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{dclzWikWorkTime}, #{commonCodeLaborSttus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE DCLZ SET DCLZ_LVFFC_TM = SYSDATE, DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME = CASE WHEN ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) >= 480 THEN DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME + ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) - 60 ELSE DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME + ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) END , COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') < '18:00:00' THEN 'LABOR_STTUS015' WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') >= '18:00:00' AND TO_CHAR(DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') < '09:01:00' THEN 'LABOR_STTUS010' WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') > '18:00:00' AND TO_CHAR(DCLZ_ATTEND_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') >= '09:01:00' THEN 'LABOR_STTUS012' ELSE '' END, DCLZ_DAIL_WORK_TIME = CASE WHEN ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) >= 480 THEN ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) - 60 ELSE ROUND((SYSDATE - DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) * 24 * 60) END WHERE DCLZ_EMPL_ID = #{dclzEMplId} AND TRUNC(DCLZ_ATTEND_TM) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
